channel.title: Lighting on Sam Kent
channel.description: Recent content in Lighting on Sam Kent

item.title: Reactive Lighting Installation
item.description: Featured on Hack A Day! Two friends studying at Leeds College of Music had a module that required them to create a piece of music for an external creative project, exhibition, or show. Together we designed, built, and exhibited the project at Hyde Park Book Club (Leeds) as part of Leeds Digital Festival. The project consists of: A Processing application Arduino 300 WS2812B LEDs 100 2L Plastic Bottles The Processing application creates an audio input stream and sets the framerate to 100 FPS.
